Name: Snakes on an Extradimensional Plane
About the game: Help the astronaut mice escape the giant neon snakes, and score some points while you're at it! A new take on the classic 'Snake' concept, SoaEP is a small game for the HTC Vive, and other SteamVR headsets, that'll really get your arms swinging! Features Steam Leaderboards support - Compete with your friends! [COMING SOON] Achievements! - Get arbitrary rewards for arbitrary tasks! Neon Snakes! - Glowy, pink and long! Powerups! - Make the snakes flee or slow down! Music by Kevin McLeod, the genius at Incompetech! Space Rodents! - What more could you possibly want? They've got tiny jetpacks!
